column4: i am using ubuntu 10.04. i installed virtualbox but i can not make a virtual cd-rom for it. can someone please help me ?
close all vm's you may have open
click on the virtual machine you want to put the iso and then settings
that is the probelm. thetre is no cd rom :(
it writes ide controller but it is disable (black ) :( it is not clickable .
so you can see "IDE controller" under "Storage Tree" but it's grayed out?
and you can't click the "add ide controller"
Name, type, and if the checkbox is checked
so you want to mount an iso file or a physical cd on your virtual machine?
ok no problem :) come anytime you want
